title: (accessibility) Help, how do i get rid of new buttons in v115, they are in my tab order and slow me down.
content: Hello I am a screen reader user, using the keyboard and thunderbird I just installed thunderbird v115, and just found out that there are three new buttons, right in the middle of folder list and message list: quick folder toggle button, message list display options button, toggle message threads button. I want these to disappear, so i can easily tab and shift tab between folder list and message list Please help, this is very important for me, I've used thunderbird for many years and this is the first problem that I've had with it.
creator: hadi.gsf

title: Thunderbird Email becomes Non-reponsive
content: I am having continual issues with Thunderbird going non-responsive for several seconds frequently whenever an action is prompted. It will work eventually, but slows everything down. This has been ongoing now for a couple of months. What can I do to fix it?
creator: gduffy

title: eMail redesigned mesage reader
content: Not a big fan of the redesigned message header. Now opens a separate window causing unnecessary clutter. Font size so little I can't read neither the "subject," the "from" line, nor the (RS) "timestamp." Selection icon buttons only show up as black boxes. No popup descriptions and attempts to select any fail. The "more" list the same tiny font. I almost always select "view using the classic reader" but then the extra window doesn't close. Very clumsy. At least provide a settings option to choose between the "classic" vs "new" reader.
creator: rm14400pm

title: Message Thread has Messages that are not part of the thread
content:
I have message threads that contain messages that are not part of the thread. I don't know how they got linked into the same thread, so are many months apart. Some times I find more than one thread in which a series of messages occur. Any ideas why that may have happened?

I would like to correct the threading but can find no way to edit threads to remove message or to break threads. Is there a way to edit threads?
creator: dclark

title: Purevpn & TB
content: I did use PIA vpn but switched to Pure vpn. TB won't send any messages when the vpn is connected. What ports am I to be using? What's wrong? Thanks

creator: solarscream88

title: Behaviour of Thunderbird filters
content:
Hi,

Using Thunderbird 102.14.0 (64-bit) on Linux Mind 20.4 Cinnamon. I made a message filter to copy all the technical news briefs of a lot of different senders from the inbox into an "Magazines" folder. The magazines folder is, as all the other email stuff, located on a NAS drive and the folder is made using an extension "LocalFolders".

The filter works but it makes several copies of the same news brief or magazine. Like, if there is a email news brief coming in, I find three or four copies of the news brief in the folder magazines. The filter is set as: - Manually Run - Getting New Mail: Filter after junk classification - Match any of the following - Multiple lines all with different email address looking as : From  ; contains  ; email address - Move Message to : folder on NAS drvie.

Somebody any idea what's wrong?

Many thank sin advance
creator: marc.defossez

title: Unable to write the email to the mailbox
content:
I cannot get new messages. I get an error:

Unable to write the email to the mailbox. Make sure the file system allows you write privileges, and you have enough disk space to copy the mailbox.

How do I fix this?
creator: srlinder1

title: Thunderbird opens malware/yahoo window in Thunderbird when checking mail
content:
Recently two new items appeared while on Thunderbird. 1. A pop up to login into my Yahoo email (obviously not from Yahoo). 2. A renewal for my Owl License.

I did click open the renewal but it seemed a little strange. So I closed it.

Decided to run a scan… now 19 hours later (it’s still scanning), shows 534 infected files so far in AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles

What is happening?
creator: jcodevelopment

title: ZASEKANÝ THUNDERBIRD.
content: Zdravím, Thunderbird používám již nějaký ten rok, ale poslední měsíc teda utrpení. Je pomalý, zobrazené emaily se mi sami znovu ukazují jako nepřečtené, štítky neštítkují a stále se stahují zprávy. Jednou to bylo x tisíc, tak jsem myslel, že je to tím. Za hodinu opět, a znovu a znovu a teď je to snad nonstop a v tom se nedá pracovat. Četl jsem podobný dotaz a rada zněla, že thunderbird má malé úložiště a člověk si jedině musí staré emaily ručně archivovat, což nepřipadá v uvahu. Lze nějaká normální "oprava" tohoto problému? X let v pořádku a teď poslední měsíc až... (Zkoušel jsem, aktualizaci, přeinstalaci. Nic nepomáhá) Děkuji
creator: jarda.nevecny

title: Since upgrade to 115 can no longer send Outlook emails
content:
I have upgraded to Thunderbird 115. Since then I no longer can send emails from my Outlook accounts! I have 2FA enabled where I need to enter a number into the MS Authenticator when I access Outlook online. I have also an app specific password. What happens when I attempt to send an email is that some sort of authentification windows pops up but it is empty where I cannnot enter anything. This window then vanishes after a couple of seconds.

I have no problems sending any emails from any other email providers where I have also 2FA enabled. It all worked fine in Thunderbird 102.

Are there any solutions to this problem or do I need to downgrade as Thunderbird does not seem to fix this problem in their upgrades.

Thank you
creator: zo11ikon

title: Usar calendario de RoundCube Mail
content:
Hola comunidad !! Es la primera vez que solicitamos ayuda, hasta ahora siempre hemos podido resolver todos los "problemillas" leyendo los foros.

En nuestra organización usamos cuentas de correo de RoundCube mail con Thunderbird, tanto en Win10 como en Linux y Android y estamos muy satisfechos con ellas. Ahora nos gustaría poder compartir un calendario entre los distintos dispositivos pero no encontramos la manera de hacerlo. Puedo obtener la url del calendario de RoundCube pero no somos capaces de configurarlo. Encuentra el calendario (formato iCal) pero siempre obtenemos el mensaje "Las credenciales que ha introducido no han sido aceptadas. Revise su configuración" Incluso si activamos la opción "Esta dirección no requiere credenciales".

He seguido los pasos que he encontrado en el foro para la configuración del calendario pero no aparece la opción de escoger el tipo de calendario de red.

Toda ayuda será bienvenida.
creator: Talleres_Saver

title: When and how can I install the Chinese language pack in Thunderbird Daily 118
content: I have compiled and run Thunderbird on linux, but the Chinese characters are garbled.At the same time, I want to develop a Chinese page for subsequent development. May I ask how to install the Simplified Chinese language pack? The language pack I see currently does not support daily118 version.Do I need to install the corresponding version of the language pack for Chinese translation after the official release of the 118 version? If so, when is the 118 version expected to come online?Thanks!
creator: TAY_TAY

title: Unified folder start with last message
content:
Hello,

I just learned about "unified folders" and it's nice to have a single Inbox for all my different mail accounts. But I am wondering if it's a bug or a feature that Thunderbird is showing the oldest message on default on startup.

https://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/media/uploads/images/2023-08-24-02-39-06-080c10.png

This is my layout. As you see I sort by date. The newest mail is on the bottom and the oldest is on top. I expect Thunderbird to jump to the latest message (bottom) on startup but it keeps starting at the top so I have to scroll down to see the newest messages.

Maybe anyone of you have any idea how to fix/change this behaviour?

EDIT: I could sort by date descending instead of ascending and have the newest message on top but I prefer it to have it at the bottom.


Thanks Multi
creator: multimill

creator: veepeek

title: New message indicator not showing for nested folders
content:
Hi

I'm running Thunderbird 115.1.1 (64-Bit) on Windows 11 Home Vsn 22H2 build 22621.2215

I have nested mail folders with message filters set up to move incoming emails to specific folders.

When a new email arrives and the folder is at level 1, 2 or 3, I get the blue new email count indicator and can drill down to the sub folder to find the email. Unfortunately if the folder is nested deeper than that, The higher level folders do not show the new email indicator so you don't know where the email is and have to go to View --> Folders -> Unread folders to find the new emails.

Is there a setting I need to change to resolve this?

Thanks in advance, Dave
creator: david.parker1

title: Remove "All Mail" folder
content:
I just added TBird 115.1.1, added to a new Windows 10 PC. 5 accounts, 2 gmail, 2 hotmail, 1 live. One of the gmails has a folder "All Mail" which seems redundant & which I'd like to remove. None of the other accounts has this. It's like having 2 "inboxes", have to mark BOTH "Read" to get new messages, well, marked as READ. Again, no other account has this, and I've been using TBird for decades, never saw this before. How do I get rid of this folder?

Thanks

Dan
creator: astral4910

title: Mail fails to send "Authentication required" in Thunderbird 115.1.1 (64 Bit)
content: I I can receive mail but cannot send. I had no problems until ver. 115 was installed. Now I get The authentication required message. I'm using Comcast as my provider. I have looked at this problem in earlier versions, but following the suggestions hasn't helped. I've checked that all the email addresses are correct. I have 3 Comcast email addresses I use and I have set the Outgoing Server to match each email address. I have also gone to Comcast and checked the box allowing 3rd party email apps.
creator: jds1239
